import React from 'react' import { Grid, Button, Container, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import { ShoppingCart } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { commerce } from "../../lib/commerce"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Product from '../Products/Product/Product'; const SingleProduct = ({product, addProduct, update, remove}) => { return (
{product.name} Price: {product.price} Quantity: {quantity}
) } export default SingleProduct
